Uniswap, tokens with 0 decimals and low supply are susceptible to significant rounding     errors when it comes to removing liquidity, possibly preventing them to be withdrawn without     some collaboration between liquidity providers.","methods":{"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_id":"ID of the Token","_owner":"The address of the token holder"},"return":"The _owner's balance of the requested (i.e. balance for each (owner, id) pair)"},"constructor":{"params":{"_currencyAddr":"The address of the ERC-1155 currency Token","_currencyID":"The ID of the ERC-1155 currency id"},"getCurrencyReserves(uint256[])":{"params":{"_ids":"Array of ID sto query currency reserve of"},"return":"amount of currency in reserve for each Token for"}},"getPrice_currencyToToken(uint256[],uint256[])":{"params":{"_ids":"Array of ID of tokens bought.","_tokensBought":"Amount of Tokens bought."},"return":"Amount of currency needed to buy Tokens exchange reserves."},"return":"Amount of currency tokens to receive from Niftyswap."},"getTokenAddress()":{"return":"Address of Token that is sold on this exchange."},"getTotalSupply(uint256[])":{"params":{"_ids":"ID of the Tokens"},"return":"The total supply of each liquidity token id provided in not"},"isValidSignature(address,bytes32,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Verifies that a hash has been signed by the given signer.","params":{"_data":"Full EIP-712 data structure that was hashed and signed","_hash":"Hash of the EIP-712 encoded data","_sig":"Proof that the hash has been signed by signer.     For non wallet signatures, _sig is expected to be an array tightly encoded as     (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType)","_signerAddress":"Address that should have signed the given hash."},"return":"True if the address recovered from the provided signature matches the input signer address."},"metaSafeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bool,bytes)":{"params":{"_amounts":"Transfer amounts per token type","_data":"Encodes a meta transfer indicator, signature, gas payment receipt and extra transfer data  _data should be encoded as (  (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType),  (GasReceipt g, ?bytes transferData) )  i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array","_from":"Source addresses","_ids":"IDs of each token type","_isGasFee":"Whether gas is reimbursed to executor or not","_to":"Target addresses"}},"metaSafeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bool,bytes)":{"params":{"_amount":"Transfered amount","_data":"Encodes a meta transfer indicator, i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array","_from":"Source address","_id":"ID of the token type","_isGasFee":"Whether gas is reimbursed to executor or not","_to":"Target address"}},"metaSetApprovalForAll(address,address,bool,bool,bytes)":{"params":{"_approved":"True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval","_data":"Encodes signature and gas payment receipt  _data should be encoded as (    (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType),    (GasReceipt g)  )  i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array","_isGasFee":"Whether gas will be reimbursed or not, with vlid signature","_operator":"Address to add to the set of authorized operators","_owner":"Address that wants to set operator status  _spender"}},"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"`_data` must be encoded as follow: containing amounts of each Token being transferred","_data":"Method signature and corresponding encoded arguments for method to call on *this* contract","_from":"The address which previously owned the Token","_ids":"An array containing ids of each Token being transferred"},"return":"bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)\")"},"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Will pass to supported."}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Get the balance of an account's Tokens"},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Get the balance of multiple whether a contract implements the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` functions and so can accept ERC1155 token types."}},"notice":"This Uniswap-like implementation supports ERC-1155 standard tokens with an ERC-1155 based token used as a currency instead of Ether. * See https://github.com/arcadeum/erc20-meta-token for a generalized ERC-20 => ERC-1155 token wrapper, with native-meta-transactions functionalities. * Liquidity tokens are also ERC-1155 tokens you can find the ERC-1155 implementation used here: nodes.documentation:
This Uniswap-like implementation supports ERC-1155 standard tokens
with an ERC-1155 based token used as a currency instead of Ether.
 * See https://github.com/arcadeum/erc20-meta-token for a generalized
ERC-20 => ERC-1155 token wrapper, with native-meta-transactions functionalities.
 * Liquidity tokens are also ERC-1155 tokens you can find the ERC-1155
implementation used here:
   https://github.com/horizon-games/multi-token-standard/tree/master/contracts/tokens/ERC1155
 * @dev Like Uniswap, tokens with 0 decimals and low supply are susceptible to significant rounding
     errors when it comes to removing liquidity, possibly preventing them to be withdrawn without
     some collaboration between liquidity providers.
nodes.name: NiftyswapExchange
_currencyToToken
getBuyPrice
_tokenToCurrency
getSellPrice
_addLiquidity
_removeLiquidity
onERC1155BatchReceived

nodes.documentation: @notice Prevents receiving Ether or calls to unsuported methods

getPrice_tokenToCurrency

devdoc.details: Like Uniswap, tokens with 0 decimals and low supply are susceptible to significant rounding     errors when it comes to removing liquidity, possibly preventing them to be withdrawn without     some collaboration between liquidity providers.

params._owner: The address of the token holder

balanceOf(address,uint256).return: The _owner's balance of the Token type requested

params._owners: The addresses of the token holders

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).return: The _owner's balance of the Token types requested (i.e. balance for each (owner, id) pair)

params._currencyAddr: The address of the ERC-1155 currency Token
params._currencyID: The ID of the ERC-1155 currency Token
params._tokenAddr: The address of the ERC-1155 Token

getBuyPrice(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Pricing function used for converting between currency token to Tokens.

params._assetBoughtReserve: Amount of Tokens (output type) in exchange reserves.
params._assetSoldReserve: Amount of currency tokens in exchange reserves.

getBuyPrice(uint256,uint256,uint256).return: Amount of currency tokens to send to Niftyswap.

getCurrencyInfo().return: Address of the currency contract that is used as currency and its corresponding id

params._ids: Array of ID sto query currency reserve of

getCurrencyReserves(uint256[]).return: amount of currency in reserve for each Token _id

getFactoryAddress().return: Address of factory that created this exchange.

params._signer: Address to query signature nonce for

params._ids: Array of ID of tokens bought.

getPrice_currencyToToken(uint256[],uint2.return: Amount of currency needed to buy Tokens in _ids for amounts in _tokensBought

params._tokensSold: Array of amount of each Token sold.

getPrice_tokenToCurrency(uint256[],uint2.return: Amount of currency that can be bought for Tokens in _ids for amounts in _tokensSold

getSellPrice(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Pricing function used for converting Tokens to currency token.

params._assetBoughtReserve: Amount of currency tokens in exchange reserves.
params._assetSoldReserve: Amount of Tokens in exchange reserves.

getSellPrice(uint256,uint256,uint256).return: Amount of currency tokens to receive from Niftyswap.

getTokenAddress().return: Address of Token that is sold on this exchange.

getTotalSupply(uint256[]).return: The total supply of each liquidity token id provided in _ids

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: True if the operator is approved, false if not

isValidSignature(address,bytes32,bytes,b.details: Verifies that a hash has been signed by the given signer.

params._data: Full EIP-712 data structure that was hashed and signed
params._hash: Hash of the EIP-712 encoded data
params._sig: Proof that the hash has been signed by signer.     For non wallet signatures, _sig is expected to be an array tightly encoded as     (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType)
params._signerAddress: Address that should have signed the given hash.

isValidSignature(address,bytes32,bytes,b.return: True if the address recovered from the provided signature matches the input signer address.

params._data: Encodes a meta transfer indicator, signature, gas payment receipt and extra transfer data  _data should be encoded as (  (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType),  (GasReceipt g, ?bytes transferData) )  i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array
params._isGasFee: Whether gas is reimbursed to executor or not

params._data: Encodes a meta transfer indicator, signature, gas payment receipt and extra transfer data  _data should be encoded as (  (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType),  (GasReceipt g, ?bytes transferData) )  i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array
params._isGasFee: Whether gas is reimbursed to executor or not

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._data: Encodes signature and gas payment receipt  _data should be encoded as (    (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, uint256 nonce, SignatureType sigType),    (GasReceipt g)  )  i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array
params._isGasFee: Whether gas will be reimbursed or not, with vlid signature
params._operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators
params._owner: Address that wants to set operator status  _spender

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.details: `_data` must be encoded as follow: abi.encode(bytes4, MethodObj)  where bytes4 argument is the MethodObj object signature passed as defined  in the `Signatures for onReceive control logic` section above

params._amounts: An array containing amounts of each Token being transferred
params._data: Method signature and corresponding encoded arguments for method to call on *this* contract
params._from: The address which previously owned the Token
params._ids: An array containing ids of each Token being transferred

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`
Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: This function MUST return true if it implements the ERC1155TokenReceiver interface and ERC-165 interface.     This function MUST NOT consume more than 5,000 gas.

params.interfaceID: The ERC-165 interface ID that is queried for support.s

supportsInterface(bytes4).return: Wheter ERC-165 or ERC1155TokenReceiver interfaces are supported.

balanceOf(address,uint256).notice: Get the balance of an account's Tokens

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).notice: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs

methods.constructor: Create instance of exchange contract with respective token and currency token

getCurrencyReserves(uint256[]).notice: Get amount of currency in reserve for each Token _id in _ids

getNonce(address).notice: Returns the current nonce associated with a given address

getPrice_currencyToToken(uint256[],uint2.notice: Return price for `currency => Token _id` trades with an exact token amount.

getPrice_tokenToCurrency(uint256[],uint2.notice: Return price for `Token _id => currency` trades with an exact token amount.

getTotalSupply(uint256[]).notice: Get total supply of liquidity tokens

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Queries the approval status of an operator for a given owner

metaSafeBatchTransferFrom(address,addres.notice: Allows anyone with a valid signature to transfer multiple types of tokens on the bahalf of _from

metaSafeTransferFrom(address,address,uin.notice: Allows anyone with a valid signature to transfer _amount amount of a token _id on the bahalf of _from

metaSetApprovalForAll(address,address,bo.notice: Approve the passed address to spend on behalf of _from if valid signature is provided

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.notice: Handle which method is being called on transfer

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.notice: Send multiple types of Tokens from the _from address to the _to address (with safety call)

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Transfers amount amount of an _id from the _from address to the _to address specified

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage all of caller's tokens

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Indicates whether a contract implements the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` functions and so can accept ERC1155 token types.

userdoc.notice: This Uniswap-like implementation supports ERC-1155 standard tokens with an ERC-1155 based token used as a currency instead of Ether. * See https://github.com/arcadeum/erc20-meta-token for a generalized ERC-20 => ERC-1155 token wrapper, with native-meta-transactions functionalities. * Liquidity tokens are also ERC-1155 tokens you can find the ERC-1155 implementation used here:   https://github.com/horizon-games/multi-token-standard/tree/master/contracts/tokens/ERC1155
